University of Minnesota

Minneapolis 14
Radio Station KUOM
770 ON YOUR DIAL
March 28, 1952
Mr, Richard L. Rider
Manager, NAEB Tape Network
119 Gregory Hall
University of Illinois
Urbana, Illinois
Dear Dick:
Tour proposed survey questionnaire is a fine beginning, and
in final form, should give us much-needed information about the wants
and desires of the individual stations. Obviously, the more we can
tailor the package to the individually expressed wants of the brotherhood,
the more valuable the network will be to its constituents.
I*m attaching a few suggestions regarding the questionnaire.
In general, though, you've done a swell job of covering all the major
angles.
Best regards
ND/arp
Northrop Dawson, Jr.
Program-Production Director
